Welcome to Virtual Toowee

Virtual personal and business assistance to save you time and money.

Let's get started

Is your growing to-do list overwhelming? Are there not enough hours in the day? Or do you need temporary support for a project? Whatever it is, hiring a Virtual Assistant (VA) is a smart move.

Book a free consultation to learn more

Services

Virtual Toowee will take care of the admin and streamline your systems. See below for the types of services available and if you need something more bespoke, please get in touch.

Admin Support

  • Date entry
  • Transcription
  • Database management
  • Word document creation
  • Spreadsheet creation & editing
  • Online research
  • Draft correspondences
  • Reports and agendas

Email & Diary Management

  • Email monitoring
  • Diary management
  • Organise meetings & calls
  • Booking meeting rooms
  • Event support

Online Support

  • Website content management
  • Social media management (including Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn and Instagram)
  • Setting up & writing email newsletters
  • Scheduling content
  • Creating online forms

Design

  • Brochures
  • Leaflets
  • Flies
  • Posters
  • Print newsletters
  • Image manipulation

Personal Support

  • Booking appointments
  • Utility bill comparison
  • Household admin
  • Restaurant/holiday research & booking
  • Travel planning & itinerary creation
  • eBay sales assistance

Project Management

  • Implementation and maintenance of online project management systems
  • Streamline electronic filing systems
  • Project support

Pricing & Plans

My pricings are simple with no hidden costs. Depending on how much and the type of support you need, tailored packages will be designed to suit your business needs.

Hourly rate

I charge a hourly rate of £30 with an initial minimum charge of 1 hour. I track my time, round up or down to the nearest 15 minutes and send you a time report with your invoice so you can see a full breakdown of hours.

By the project

Sometimes it's easier to set a fixed price for a specific project or during busy periods. An initial quote is given based on the scope of the project but can be subject to revision if the parameters of the project later change.

Monthly retainers

If you know you require ongoing support every month then a retainer package at a fixed price is the perfect choice. We'll discuss the ideal monthly package that's the most appropriate for the tasks at hand. I track my time and will let you know if you're nearing your limit so that you don't worry about spiraling costs.


Please note that monthly retainers are paid for at the beginning of the month and must be used within the month of purchase. Any unused retainer hours are non-transferable and non-refundable. Payments are to be made by bank transfer only.
